00077 class IPMPMessageFromBitstream: public IPMPToolMessage {
00078 public:
00086   IPMPMessageFromBitstream(const ByteT& ver, const Bit32T& send, const Bit32T&
00087     receive, const std::vector<IIPMPStreamDataUpdate*>& upd): IPMPToolMessage(ver,
00088     send, receive), updates(upd) {
00089   }
00090 
00091   virtual ~IPMPMessageFromBitstream() {
00092     std::vector<IIPMPStreamDataUpdate*>::iterator iter = updates.begin();
00093     while (iter != updates.end()) {
00094       delete (*iter);
00095       iter++;
00096     }
00097     updates.clear();
00098   }
00099 
00104   const std::vector<IIPMPStreamDataUpdate*>& GetIPMPStreamDataUpdates() const {
00105     return updates;
00106   }
00107 
00108 private:
00109   std::vector<IIPMPStreamDataUpdate*> updates;
00110 };
